title: Comparing approximations by various Riemann sums

content.prompt: The graph of the function f is shown above for 0 ≤ x ≤ 3 . Of the following, which has the least value?

choices.label: ∫ 1 3 f ( x )dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F92@

Left Riemann sum approximation of ∫ 1 3 f ( x )dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F92@ with 4 subintervals of equal length

Right Riemann sum approximation of ∫ 1 3 f ( x )dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F92@ with 4 subintervals of equal length

Midpoint Riemann sum approximation of ∫ 1 3 f ( x )dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F92@ with 4 subintervals of equal length

Trapezoidal sum approximation of ∫ 1 3 f ( x )dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F92@ with 4 subintervals of equal length

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Explain how an approximated value relates to the actual value.
